logoutNoInternet: You have no internet connection. Please try again later...

carousel.slide4Description: Be in direct contact with applicants.

auth.termsText: By signing up you accept the

errors.emailNotValid: The email address is not valid.
errors.passwordTooShort: Password too short. At least 8 characters needed.

alerts.invalidPhone: Please insert a valid phone number.

tutorial.firstCardDescription: Swipe right for the jobs you'd like to apply for!
tutorial.secondCardDescription: Wait for a company to accept you or accept an invite.
tutorial.thirdCardDescription: Make it personal and chit chat with your future employer.
tutorial.fourthCardDescription: Accept the proposal the company will send you to make it official.

errors.invalidEmail: Make sure you provide a valid email address!

createVacancy.title: Create vacancy
createVacancy.jobCategoriesInfo: In what job category is your job located
createVacancy.generalInfo: Tell us a bit more about the job
createVacancy.photoInfo: Upload a photo which represents the work environment
createVacancy.scheduleInfo: When and how long do you need this temp worker
createVacancy.jobLocationInfo: The address where the job will be located

jobTitleScreen.title: Jobtitle
jobTitleScreen.hint2: Try to make this title simple but self-explanatory.

jobCategoryScreen.title: Job category
jobCategoryScreen.hint: In what job category is your job located?

descriptionScreen.title: Description
descriptionScreen.hint: What are your expectations? What are the conditions? What’s in it for them? Convince them with your writing skills.

wageScreen.title: Wage
wageScreen.hint: Fil in the gross hourly wage.
wageScreen.hint2: This is just an indication for the candidates.

generalInfoScreen.title: General info
generalInfoScreen.jobInfo: Try to make this title simple but self-explanatory.
generalInfoScreen.termInfo: What kind of temp-worker do you need?
generalInfoScreen.sectorInfo: In which sector is this job located?
generalInfoScreen.wageInfo: Fill in the gross hourly wage. This can be changed when sending the proposal. This is just an indication for the candidates.

shortDescription.title: Short Description
shortDescription.placeholder: Be creative in your job tweet
shortDescription.hint: Make sure your vacancy stands out to the rest of the vacancies. This description is show on the vacancy cards.

vacancyPhoto.title: Vacancy photo
vacancyPhoto.firstParagraph: A picture is worth a thousand words!
vacancyPhoto.secondParagraph: Choose a photo which represents to work environment. This can be a photo of the company facade, working place or company banner.

vacancySchedule.title: Schedule
vacancySchedule.oneDayDescription: Choose this schedule if the assignment is only one single day.
vacancySchedule.oneDayExplanation: Explanation about the one day schedule
vacancySchedule.multipleDaysDescription: Choose this schedule if the assignment is for several days.
vacancySchedule.multipleDaysExplanation: Explanation about the multiple days schedule
vacancySchedule.fixedPeriodDescription: Choose this schedule if the assignment is for the same days for some period.
vacancySchedule.indefiniteDurationDescription: Choose this schedule if the assignment is for the same days for an indefinite period.
vacancySchedule.indefiniteDurationExplanation: Explanation about the indefinite period  schedule

otherCapacitiesScreen.title: Other capacities
otherCapacitiesScreen.hint1: Does the temp worker need a license or car?
otherCapacitiesScreen.hint2: What languages should the temp worker need to speak?

skilltags.title: Skilltags
skilltags.hint: Choose 1 - 3 main skilltags that fit best to your vacancy

longDescription.title: Long Description
longDescription.hint: What are your expectations? What are the conditions? What’s in it for them? Convince them with your writing skills.

location.title: Job Location
location.hint: Fill in the address where the job will be located.

vacancy.title: My Vacancies
vacancy.noVacancyInfo: Start by creating a new vacancy

screenCandidates.candidatesDescription: Come back later for more candidates to screen.

manageApplicants.noPhoneNumber: The candidate doesn't have a phone number
manageApplicants.matchDescription: Start inviting candidates to get matched. You can chat with matched candidates.
manageApplicants.sealDescription: Send a proposal to a candidate to Seal The Deal. By sending a proposal you confirm the candidate can come and work for you.

confirmationModals.publishedDescription: Start by inviting candidates. Accepted invitations will trigger a match where you’ll be able to start chatting with each other!
confirmationModals.removeApplicantTitle: Are you sure you want to erase your match with
confirmationModals.publishedVacancyDescription: Start by inviting candidates. Accepted invitations will trigger a match where you’ll be able to start chatting with each other!
confirmationModals.pauseVacancyTitle: You’re about to pause your vacancy
confirmationModals.pauseVacancyDescription: Pausing your vacancy means it won’t be visible for candidates to apply. Your matched & sealed candidates however will still be connected!
confirmationModals.resumeVacancyTitle: You’re about to resume your vacancy
confirmationModals.resumeVacancyDescription: Your vacancy will be publicly visible again so candidates are able to apply to it.
confirmationModals.reuseVacancyTitle: You’re about to reuse your vacancy
confirmationModals.reuseVacancyDescription: All the data will be reused, except for the schedule. You’ll need to refill the schedule.

chat.title: Chat
chat.noMessages: No messages! Start talking to get to know each other...
chat.noJobConnections: When you’ve matched with an employee the connection will appear here!

onboarding.logoHint: We recommend you upload your company logo. A visually attractive profile encourages employees to apply for your vacancies.

aboutMe.title: Reviews about me
aboutMe.noReviewsHint: When you’ve sealed and done jobs, your reviews about them will appear here.

giveReviewScreen.title: Give review
giveReviewScreen.inputTextHint: Tell us a bit more about your experience with him/her
giveReviewScreen.confirmSubmitMessage: Are you sure you want to submit this review?
giveReviewScreen.confirmCancelMessage: Are you sure you want to cancel this review?
